name: Super Roller Doggos
description:
Warning, the menu music can be a bit loud, adjust speakers accordingly.

A game I've made as my personal project while following along with beginner Unity tutorials such as Create with Code at Unity Learn. 

You roll a doggo down a modified mountain terrain and collect points.

The saving system for high scores is a bit dumb, but I just wanted to push this out the door now! Also there's sadly no web-based version as something broke when I tried to build it for WebGL so not sure if I'll try to fix that.
